DOC.brief_summary: The purpose project use white-skinned sweet potato main material weight control overweight obesity , non-communicable disease ( cardiovascular disease , cancer , chronic respiratory disease diabetes ) also include . All high quality sweet potato provide CAES Taiwan produce special nutrient food health food functional study Shih Chien University Taipei Medical University . In study , investigator recruit overweight obesity subject divide white sweet potato group ( experimental group ) intervention group ( control group ) use randomize , parallel open clinical study sixty day .
DOC.brief_title: The Effect White Sweet Potato Meal Replacement Weight Control Obesity
DOC.detailed_description: All subject evaluate body weight clinical nutrition assessment postural measurement , urine test blood biomarker examination .
DOC.criteria: 24≦ BMI≦30 Pregnant lactate woman Patients within six month surgery Mental illness depression Suffering cancer , ulcer , acute respiratory infection , dialysis , acute hepatitis disease Those take `` additional nutritional supplement '' habit
